name: In The Mainframe
description:
Welcome to the Mainframe where you want to gather some information about these companies and what shady deals they are doing, but it wont be easy. There will be guards patrolling the area and you will have to sneak around them while hacking computers for important files.
CONTROLS:

A - Left
D - Right
C - Sneak (Over Bookshelf)
Space - Action

This game was made for the weekly game jam week 138 and will not be worked on any more than it already is unless I feel like I want to do more with it.
